Reviews.Title: “Nice and cozy, but maybe not the quality you would expect”
Reviews.Author: inkai
Reviews.Content: The staff was friendly and helpful, the pic-up service from airport is very good plus. The rooms are pretty and cozy. But then the complaints: we had to ask for plankets and sheets, for toiletpaper, for a towel etc, because there were none or only one peacein the room for two people. The cleaning lady does not act like she works in a quality hotel, she didn't even make our bed. The breakfast contains very few items and when I asked for something that had run out, the answer was no, no eggs this morning anymore. Eating only white bread, 10 types of jam and some tomatoes is not a full breakfast for me. Sleeping quality is okay - but it depends totally who your neighbours are, because the walls are thin. I really liked this hotel, but unfortunately I have to point out the flaws listed abowe.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel”
Reviews.Author: Yiming C
Reviews.Content: Great and very helpful stuff. I love the great location right in the tourist center. Istanbul is a great city!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Staff and Good Breakfast !”
Reviews.Author: darknesscem
Reviews.Content: i stayed 2nd time in this lovely place. I had to meeting in Bursa for it i choose to 1 night stay in this hotel again. Its close to Yenikapi ferry. I arrived late early in the morning. i was so tired from flight and my business problem. But when i arrived to hotel reception guy Fuad changed my mood to happy and relax. He was so funny. He ordered me green tea and helped me to carry my luggage. He was so kind . In this time i stayed single room. But their single room also was very good. Double king size bed and same conditions . In the morning i was first in the breakfast lobby. Breakfast lady talked with me russian language. I was very happy for this :) After breakfast daily reception Tayfoun helped for ticket to me Yenikapi ferry and called taxi for me. All staff were very hellpfull. Thank you again . I think i will visit you in June next time :)

Reviews.Title: “not what we expected”
Reviews.Author: sandbucket1000
Reviews.Content: we selected this hotel as a result of others not being available and on the back of a number of reviews in TA. on the positive side the hotel in in a good location. it just doesn't add up, given we probably paid over the odds because it was the easter break, however everything abou he place was second rate. it came as no surprise to discover that the hotel was previously a hostel, it certainly had that feel about it. breakfast was ordinary and boring, the breakfast room is cramped. for the 5 days we were there we did not see one piece of fresh fruit. the rooms are small and very basic. Cleaning was sporadic and on one day the rooms were not touched by the cleaners. management represented the tired nature of the establishment. my view.. if you can pay hostel rates it's probably worth it, otherwise look somewhere else

Reviews.Title: “Basic Rooms with Basic Breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Lempert
Reviews.Content: I'd like to mention good location of the hotel. If you take a budget room, you should be ready that the bathroom is very small. Furniture is not new, and the cleanliness of the room could be better. Breakfast is basic (i've seen some better ones at budget hotels). It's good for 1 night stay, but there are some better hotels at the same price.

Reviews.Title: “Good location and stay...”
Reviews.Author: Xplor3r
Reviews.Content: Me and a few friends stayed at the Zeugma Hotel. The overall stay was fine! The rooms are cleaned regularly on a daily basis with fresh towels, water bottles and sweets. The rooms have a bed, wardrobe, en-suite shower and toilet. in addition they come with with air conditioning, central heating and a flat screen TV with remote. The hotel offers free wifi on all floors (passwords can be obtained from reception). As we were out most of the day we only met and interacted with the Fuat the night shift receptionist Fuat was very friendly and is such a jolly person. He was very helpful in providing us with information/ directions and room service. He always offered his assistance and makes very good tea! The hotel has the small restaurant on the 4th floor which is basic with four table sets (each holds 4 people). The buffet breakfast is basic and has food such as (French bread, boiled eggs, cheese rolls, cheese slices, bread, jam, butter, chocolate spreads, cucumber, tomato, olives, choice of 2 cereals, various tea, Turkish tea, coffee and orange/pomegranate juices. The only problem with the buffet breakfast was that it was limited and the service lady didnâ€™t understand any English. We went for breakfast and found there was no milk & bread (so no cereal & no tea) â€“ managed to explain this to the service lady, but she didnâ€™t do anything about it nor provided more milk. Didnt seem bothered at all. The Zeugma Hotel is located bang on in the centre of the Sultanehmet which is brilliant. It is within walking distance to the main sights and transport links. Sights Distance from hotel: - The Blue Mosque (Istanbulâ€™s main sight) is 4-5 minutesâ€™ walk - Aya Sophia Museum is about 5-6 minutesâ€™ walk - The Topkapi Palace is about 10 minutesâ€™ walk - The Metro Tram services is about 8 minutesâ€™ walk - Aya Sophia Hamam is about 5 minutesâ€™ walk - Mini-markets are less than a minutesâ€™ walk right outside hotel). - Ataturk Airport (25 minutes providing the traffic is ok). The location of Zeugma is just fantastic and the accomodation overall is good.

Reviews.Title: “like home ..”
Reviews.Author: aleyna y
Reviews.Content: I would like to thanks and my pleasure to hotel staff before begining my comments. I am a Turkish girl who live in Bern that province of Switzerland I visit my country sometimes that I loved very much especially the city of istanbul where I was born, actually although I have family and relatives in Istanbul I prefer to stay here because of stand alone with my husband and take a tour as much as I want in istanbul. When we return the honeymoon we stayed this hotelâ€™s sweet and authentic suit room in july and we liked very much then we prefered this hotel without any hesitation during the visiting istanbul in last week , we could stay in a standard room just three days and due to no vacation on suit rooms our room was not seascape :( The hotelâ€™s location is favorite area in sultanahmet and very convinient no transport difficulties, however, the hotel manager Mr. Melih has already arranged the trasportation from AtatÃ¼rk airport to hotel, it was very nice, we were wellcomed friendly and smile faces by hotel staff . I would say we liked very much new decoration in lobby and bath it was very chic and clean and also I think the breakfast was more abundant ,clean and delicious this time . we leaved very pleased again many thank and see you ZEUGMA :)

Reviews.Title: “very friendly and well positioned hotel.”
Reviews.Author: amandahMiddlesex
Reviews.Content: this lovely little hotel is very well appointed, and is right within walking distance of all of the main historical attractions in Istanbul. the rooms - we booked standard rooms which did not come with coffee and tea facilities, but when i asked if we could have them-the manager was great and let us have them. the single beds are small but comfortable, clean and cosy. the shower was powerful and hot! staff were great, nothing too much trouble, and very helpful. (all of them were fab) hotel is very good value for the price. breakfast was perfectly adequate i enjoyed the olives and feta. dont expect a european breakfast! overall i would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a reasobily priced hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Gorgeous Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Jerry_Brad_Henderson
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very close to all historical place,so It was amazing holiday for my family and me.Moreover, the hotel's employees are so friendly. Not only employees but also hotel's conditions have miscellaneous opportunity such as room choice. Therefore,next time I will be here again and I recommend to everyone ;)

Reviews.Title: “What a wonderful place!”
Reviews.Author: 202Ahmet_12
Reviews.Content: I was really enjoy with this experiment. Wonderful place with wonderful customer service. This place is one of the best hotel in Istanbul. You can watch amazing Blue Mosque view and you can drink your very delicious hot wine with your friends. There was very lovely place with its very kind and lovely personnel. THIS WAS MY BEST EXEPERIMENT EVER.. You should see this city from this hotel.. I already miss you guys. And I'm gonna visit you again as soon as possible :)

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sonia A
Reviews.Content: I was in zeugma in January 2012, and we were well received, the location is strategic near blue mosquee, ayaSofia and other touristic sites , the staff was helpful and kind, I have enjoyed my stay there and i highly recommend this hotel which is not expensive, clean and well located... very good quality / price ratio. Sonia

Reviews.Title: “good location”
Reviews.Author: Nuroner
Reviews.Content: Thank you so much. Hotel is near both Sultanahmet and public houses and in a good location. On the other hand hotel- related serves are also satisfactory with its respective staff and oppurtunities that are provided.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent !!”
Reviews.Author: Alessandra g
Reviews.Content: The hotel was great. IÂ´ve been there twice and every year I enjoyed it. Fuat is a so good person.. I ll come back for Fuat..

Reviews.Title: “Excellent !!!”
Reviews.Author: darknesscem
Reviews.Content: I spent in this hotel 9 nights with my girl friend . I got amazing, lovely room. Room has really nice and clean bathroom with big-space shower and pleasant hot water. Temperature of room was perfect. And breakfast was delicious. I booked double room, price was so cheap for quality. reception guy and hotel manager was really helpfull. Mr. melih who is hotel manager he helped us for go to tram station when weather was rainy . i never will forget his amazing drive :) Blue Mosque, Hagia Sofia, Topkapi palace are 3-5 minutes far by walk from hotel. i definetely will stay this lovely hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “very good”
Reviews.Author: infomer
Reviews.Content: we have visited Ä°stanbul for a wedding party in mean time we wanna see some excited sites of Istanbul. We have choosed Zeugma Hotel after a good research. Now we can say one of our best choice. There was a good breakfast with 30 or 35 different things. Service was good and all authorized person was always smiling. For location, it is very close to TopkapÄ± Palace Ayasofya and Sultan Ahmed mosque. In the same time, it is very close to bus and train station which you can access to all Ä°stanbul. Thank you to Zeugma Hotel and its crew.

Reviews.Title: “Really nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: ronald_wilcock1
Reviews.Content: We find this hotel an excellent choice for our trips to Istanbul and hope to return again 2012. It has a a relaxed friendly atmosphere. The hotel is in the centre of Sultanahmet area and within walking distance to many historical sites. The staff here are very friendly and helpful, also very knowlageable about the area and only too willing to advise. Rooms are good,they have a good clean efficient service.and breakfast is served overlooking the busy street below, and have to say there is no noise inside the hotel very quiet and restful.Just outside the hotel the choice of restaurants is also very good and reasonably priced . All together having found this hotel we have no need to look elsewhere we are more than happy with this one..

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: djebazapelo
Reviews.Content: We were at hotel in October. Seven nights. Staff is very friendly, always at service. Room is always clean, and quiet so we were able to sleep after walking all day around Istanbul. I must point out that whatever we need, any questions how to get to some historical or any other site, we were instructed. Location is great, only 4-5 minutes from Hagia Sofia, Blue Mosque and Topkapi palace by walk. Breakfast wasn't that good

Reviews.Title: “Really in the historical Sultanahmet center”
Reviews.Author: Franco Z
Reviews.Content: Really excellent location in the heart of Sultanahmet area, few steps away from Haja Sofia, the Blue Mosque and the Cisterna Basilica. The staff is very friendly and available to provide help and advice. The room service is very efficient and the rooms are very clean. A really cost-effective solution. Breakfast is rich and in a nice location, at the top of the hotel, facing the street and the top minarets of Haja Sofia and the Blue Mosque.

Reviews.Title: “Zeugma good”
Reviews.Author: sarawak65
Reviews.Content: We stayed there in September for 4 nights. Great central location. Enjoyed their free pickup from the airport which was a great start. Our room was a bit on the small side but it was at the back of the building and was therefore quiet and we were able to sleep with the window open. Nicely decorated and clean rooms with helpful staff. The breakfast could be improved by some fresh fruit - the only fresh item was the bread but the toastie maker was a good addition

Reviews.Title: “Zeugma Hotel a winning choice!”
Reviews.Author: michi c
Reviews.Content: The Staff is very friendly! The room was very nice and always clean! The very spacious bathroom and hot water all day! The breakfast is wonderfull!

Reviews.Title: “Very small hotel, almost scary but good people”
Reviews.Author: Sumaira1
Reviews.Content: This hotel was our second hotel in istanbul. First one was Erboy When we got here we were a little shocked how small it was compared to Erboy. The people at the hotel are very good. We had to change our reservation and they were cool about it and even upgraded us to the Deluxe room for free. Though the room was good but terrible view and to get to the room through the dingy hallway was scary. Room was very clean and airconditioned. Also, this area is made ONLY for tourist so you won't get very much local culture. Prices of food are very high and food is tasteless. iT'S 5 minutes from Blue Mosque so that's not bad.

Reviews.Title: “good hotel in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: bochen
Reviews.Content: Very good location for visiting Istanbul. The receptionists are very nice and the breakfast is also good. However, the price is a little expensive.

Reviews.Title: “Cozy small hotel allowing you to get into the spirit of Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Assia A
Reviews.Content: The location of the hotel is really perfect if you want to walk around the city and visit main sights. It is a nice small hotel, seems to be a family run one with warm comfartable romantic atmosphere and friendly staff (especially the lady serving breakfast). We liked our suite room on the top floor with very beautiful view of Bosphorus. We were provided with free transfer from Ataturk airport, as stayed for four nights in the hotel and small bottle of wine was a gift (I guess because of the suite room). Unfortunately, only breakfast is served in the hotel, but you can always have some good coffee and meals in restaurants situated nearby. Breakfast is served on a nice terrace with view of the old city center. Most of the places of interest are in walking distance, and even if you wand to go to the new part of the city, tram station is about 5 minutes on foot. In general, I would say that it is a good hotel to stay in the old center of Istanbul as it has a typical ottoman style and allows you to get into the spirit of Istanbul, a link and mediator between Europe and Asia.

Reviews.Title: “Feel at home in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Bee J
Reviews.Content: We stayed 8 nights in this hotel in a superb location. Just around the corner from all historic sites of the old town in Istanbul, it is situated in a street with a lot of small cafes and and some fantastic roof top terraces that you should check out! Felt safe and like at home. We have enjoyed the friendly service of all hotel staff, especially the manager Melih is extremely helpful. Breakfast was simple but delicious. The rooms were ok, our first room, we had a broken shower and not enough towels, we were then upgraded to a better room for a few days, which was great and really appreciated.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel in excellent Location, helpful staff, good choice!!”
Reviews.Author: Gregory N
Reviews.Content: We stayed 3 nights. The location was great !! All the historical sites of Sultanahmet were close by and walking distance. Felt safe. The rooms were very clean and our suite room had excellant view of Bosphorus and sea of Marmara. Bathroom was clean. Big plasma tv with European channels. The staff were extremley helpful. Could not ask for better service. The open buffet breakfast was good with usual range of produce. In a nutshell the hotel was good value for money . Would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone travelling with families or friends:)

Reviews.Title: “Great room, great staff, great location”
Reviews.Author: Nelson P
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Zeugma for 10 nights while in Istanbul. We were drawn to it because of its website, which gave a great idea of what the place was like. We weren't disappointed. The rooms were as we'd expected and provided a comfortable place for us to retire after a long day of sightseeing. The location is in the Old Istanbul District, very close to the "big three" attractions in that area - the Blue Mosque, Aya Sofia, and Topkapi Palace. There are plenty of other great sights and sites nearby - museums, parks, and so on. It's near the tramway, making it easy to get around to less touristy areas of the city as well as other transportation centers - the train and bus stations, the ferry ports, etc. The front desk staff (Cem and Sukru) were very helpful, too, always ready to provide advice on how to get around and where to eat, tidbits about Turkish culture and history, etc. I've read on on some forums that a few people disliked the small breakfasts, but we found them just fine and ate breakfast at Zeugma every morning - they're not small at all, and you can pick and choose what and how much to eat (buffet style). Mrs. Tuna, who does both the breakfast service and room cleaning, is a sweet and friendly woman. The only complaint we have is that sometimes the street out in front of the hotel gets a bit noisy late into the night hours, but that is to be expected at a central location like this. After a day or so, we adapted and it was really no problem. In sum, we highly recommend Zeugma Hotel! For us, it was a great value for the money.

Reviews.Title: “A+++++++++++”
Reviews.Author: Guillaume D
Reviews.Content: Excellent staff, clean rooms, would definitely recommend......:))

Reviews.Title: “One of the best choice”
Reviews.Author: yamage
Reviews.Content: Friendly staff, clean room,hot shawer, air conditioning works fine, easy to access popular place to visit, this is why a bit noisy.

Reviews.Title: “Excelent location”
Reviews.Author: Silmar44
Reviews.Content: Excelent location in the old city , just steps to all main attractions. Surrounded by many nice restaurants and bars for nightlife. Rooms are very nice and clean and the service is very good. Breakfast could be better.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and we will surely go back there.”
Reviews.Author: krooz2
Reviews.Content: The closeness to all major attractions. Nice and helpful staff and manager and hotel owner. They treated us like a family. We could ask for any help any they would offer us a good option. Clean,cosy and cute. Sami and Melih ( the owner and son) as werll as Cem,Shokroo and Tuna were all very friendly and helpful. We miss them.

Reviews.Title: “My mother said was lovely, so itâ€™s well recommended:)”
Reviews.Author: ifm05
Reviews.Content: Iâ€™m sharing now indirect and partially direct experiences about Zeugma Hotel. I gave to my mother for her 57th birthday a long holiday trip at Istanbul. Because my previous trips I know well the city but now I decided to reserve for her a hotel which isnâ€™t yet familiar for me. I found Zeugma by tripadvisor and decided to book here. After successful booking I contacted directly the hotel to make clear some thinks and also to get information about transporting from Sabiha Gokcen airport because I travelled always Ataturk airport. Hotelâ€™s owner was so helpful and we had a useful correspondence. Finally a day I take my mother to airport and went to workâ€¦ and I was very nice surprised when I got a mail: Your mother just arrived to our hotel. I wanted to give notice. And now my motherâ€™s experience: â€˜my son, please write only very good thinks about them on internet. They are very nice people, so helpful and theirs hospitality made us very comfortable. Our room was very nice and clean. The hotel is situated very well in central part of city, all important sightseeing are just few steps. It was very nice to stay there, say them many thanks!â€™ Never say no for your mother:) So here is: guys, thank you so much for your hospitality, your place is so recommended for everybody.

Reviews.Title: “I felt like a Sultan Princess...”
Reviews.Author: PeggySanFrancisco
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I were looking for a romantic but reasonably priced place to stay that was walking distance to everything, and we happened to walk upon the Zeugma Hotel. They gave us the penthouse level room and a great deal on the place. It was everything we had hoped for and more so that we could enjoy our last romantic night together in Istanbul. The reception area is extremely helpful and can organize almost anything for you...even one of the managers carried my bag up the flights of stairs to our room, and was happy to do so. The included breakfast spread is wonderful and the woman that works there made sure the food was fresh and replenished for when we sat down. Needless to say, the service is great! We liked it so much, we're actually returning next week! -Peggy and Simone

Reviews.Title: “Great location nice staff”
Reviews.Author: Irrenne
Reviews.Content: The hotel has very good location if you wish to live in historical part of Istanbul. It's just near Aya Sofia Museum. I also like the street where the hotel is located. It's full of nice and warm turkish cafes so in the evenings you can spend your time excellent. In spite of that it's quiet in the hotel and you will never hear any noise from the street.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Good Value for Money”
Reviews.Author: ddhdubai
Reviews.Content: Zeugma Hotel's location is perfect to explore the main attractions in the "old" area of Istanbul - Sultanahmet. Blue Mosque, Topkapi Palace and Aya Sofia are all within 15 minutes' walk or less. Both Cem and Sukru are very friendly, helpful and informative. The Breakfast and Cleaning Lady - Mrs. Tuna - made us feel spoilt during breakfast with her effort to give us the extra service. With its great location, good service and value for money, we think Zeugma Hotel is definitely a place to stay in Sultanahmet.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for sightseeing”
Reviews.Author: kyemily
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Zeugma for 5 nights at the start of May. Situated in Sultanahmet, well presented small hotel and great value for money. Met Cem at reception who showed us to our room on the 2nd floor and gave us a quick run through of the room. Room was clean and pleasantly decorated and a request that I had put in when booking had been taken care of. The location of the hotel is perfect for visits to the Aya Sofya, Blue Mosque, Cisterns, markets etc by foot. There is a fantastic tram service just 5mins walk (max) from hotel. Cem at reception with tell you about this and lots of other interesting bits of information. Plenty of restaurants/bars/cafes on the same road as hotel but we tended to eat further away from the hotel. Best bit about the hotel are the people, Cem is very helpful, Melih answered all my emails promptly, the night porter was very friendly and polite and Tuna the breakfast lady/chambermaid is an angel. We will stay there again and we have already started to recommend our friends stay at the Zeugma.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff great location”
Reviews.Author: sanyijudit
Reviews.Content: We stayed in Istanbul for only 3 nights so the location was important to us. This hotel is virtually 5 mins walk away from Blue Mosque, Top Kapi Palace and Haghia Sophia. 15 mins wak away from the Grand Bazaar. Rooms are basic but clean and functional, beds were really comfortable. The staff were fantastic, they couldn't do enough for us. Breakfast was nice. Loads of restaurants in the street with reasonably priced tasty food. Highly recommended- great value for money, excellent customer service, fantastic location!! :o)

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, very nice hotel, friendly personnel”
Reviews.Author: Chico-checo
Reviews.Content: Hotel is very well located just a minute walk to Sultan Ahmed and Sofia Musk. Friendly and helpful staff at hotel, many nice bars and restaurants just in front of the hotel. Rooms are smaller, but very clean and comfortable. Recommended for any travellers.

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel! Wonderful place, good staff and perfect location - 5 steps from Sultanahmet Camii.”
Reviews.Author: Dani049
Reviews.Content: Very good hotel! Perfect location! Quiet, good staff, spacious rooms, comfortable, clean. Good breakfast!

Reviews.Title: “Great location, terrible bed”
Reviews.Author: eggplantkafka
Reviews.Content: This hotel was in a great location, on a charming street just around the corner from the Hagia Sophia and the Blue Mosque. The rooms are charming and nicely decorated. The staff is friendly and helpful. The bed and the bathroom are a different story. The bed was hard as a rock. The old mattress was about 3 inches thin and the non-fitted sheet was always coming off. The bathroom was visibly covered in a thick black mold/mildew. After taking a shower the smell was overwhelming and made your eyes sting. We told the management but there was a language barrier and I don't think our complaint registered. The reviews of this place were good so I hope it was just our room. If you plan to stay to here ask to see the room first.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, friendly & helpful staff, good value for your money”
Reviews.Author: Uchisar
Reviews.Content: I've traveled to Turkey many times, this time arriving middle of the night after 20 hours of travel and was met by helpful staff who got me quickly settled into my room. Slept like a baby for 8 hours straight, no noise as I had experienced in other Istanbul hotels. Breakfast on the terrace was my favorite Turkish breakfast with tomatoes, cucumbers, cheeses, eggs, meats, bread, coffee and tea. The breakfast server was a tiny, energetic and very friendly woman named Tuna. What a sweetie pie! We had a fine conversation in our fractured "Turklish" language. She was charming and helped get the day off to a fine start. I highly recommend Zeugma Hotel and look forward to my next stay there!

Reviews.Title: “Good Value in a great location!”
Reviews.Author: happylittlevegemites
Reviews.Content: Value for money in a really handy and lively location. Neat and tidy rooms and very helpful staff. Breakfast was basic but then the friendly breakfast lady offered to cook us up some extras like Sigara Boregi (cigar shaped pastry filled with feta cheese) which really made the difference. She also was frying up eggs for other guests which was good to see along with some friendly banter.

Reviews.Title: “It was perfect”
Reviews.Author: Chris_Finland
Reviews.Content: When I vizit the istanbul absolutly I stay in Zeugma Hotel.Great location,close the all historical places,restaurants.Staff is friendly,they answers all questions with smiley face. Breakfast is nice at the terrace.

Reviews.Title: “It's wonderful”
Reviews.Author: TaherAlami
Reviews.Content: My daytime schedules are very busy so I asked my friends,they told me about Zeugma Hotel. This hotel is very busy and frequented by individual tourists and large groups of travelers from Europe and Asia. The hotel is very guest friendly; Wi-Fi internet coupons for 1 to 3 hours are available for a free,a very nice view. I booked a single, but received twin beds, which i find it comfortable.there is also Air Conditioning, Private bathroom with shower, Direct dial telephones, Flat Screen LCD Television and Hairdryer.... In conclusion , i find this hotel amazing which i like to come to it when i come to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Great service, great location”
Reviews.Author: Yuksell
Reviews.Content: The hotel was in a great location, close to all tourist areas. Nice and helpfull staff, beautifull furniture and decoration, it really felt like we were in Istanbul...

Reviews.Title: “zeugma hotel”
Reviews.Author: rogarey
Reviews.Content: zeugma is really good location. I think , everybody who come to Istanbul should see there ..

Reviews.Title: “Perfect”
Reviews.Author: jaypao
Reviews.Content: The hotel is really nice, clean and comfortable...The staff are amazing and very friendly...Definitely will stay again at this hotel...

Reviews.Title: “Quality stay”
Reviews.Author: Rebcan
Reviews.Content: This was a great hotel for those on a budget. Rooms are small but the location is excellent. Close to all the attractions in Sultanhammet. The street is a little noisy but that just adds to the excitement. Breakfast was quite good. The front staff was very helpful and can arrange travel and busses to your next locations if travelling outside of istanbul. I would stay here again. Free internet was provided which was an unexpected bonus.

Reviews.Title: “Better choices nearby”
Reviews.Author: Frances026
Reviews.Content: Rooms are quite well equipped but those on the road side of the hotel are noisy from the restaurants below. The bathroom shower was mouldy and really needs to be addressed. The breakfast is standard at best, certainly not above average for a Turkish buffet, sits in the sun for long periods of time during breakfast hours, processed meat is therefore a little scary. Be sure to establish price and exchange rate when agreeing to a room. It is close to tourist sights and facilities but there appear to be better choices in the same street.

HotelInfo.Name: Zeugma Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Sultanahmet Mah. Akbiyik caddesi. No:35, Istanbul 34400, Turkey
